item.title: Who am I?
item.description:
Hi! I am Tu Anh Dao, an official member of VN_MSEC, which is a CTF team in Vietnam. Now I work as a “free” security engineer. I focus on malware analysis and digital forensics.

Professional Experience

  • Intern at VCS (I really love this time ğŸ˜Š)
  • Security engineer at an organization in Vietnam (3yrs)

Education

  • Currently pursuing a Masterâ€™s degree in Information Systems at Le Quy Don Technical University, Vietnam.

Skills

  • Reverse engineering
  • Digital forensics
  • Basic web security testing

Projects
